text: I'm shocked this is the first entry from this game on the list! I highly suggest this game, and certainly can say from the demo on Wii U Legends may possibly be even better! The Challenges DLC already available in eshop is mind blowingly awesome.

text:
This will go on the history of 2D platforming as one of the most ball-busting difficult final levels ever.
Land of the Livid Dead will be meeting Scrap Brain Zone and Tubular soon.
author: g-rev

text: I finished the game recently, cooping all the way through with my brother. We had a blast! I really recommend the game: It is challenging, fun, and has a really gorgeous art style. This level in particular will challenge you as an old school game would.

author: Hawlo

text: One of those games I still need to play. I have no idea why I didn't buy it cheap on Steam during the various sales, but I won't make the same mistake next time. This theme itself is pretty varied: I find the voices from 0:40 to 1:00 a bit annoying (I'm sure they wouldn't bother me ingame), then at﻿ 1:00 comes my favorite part, I love the chorus. Then at 1:40 we have a western﻿ chasing﻿ theme that's also very enjoyable. It seems like Morricone was the obvious inspiration!
